name: Colony Defender (kimcodekill, Latent_Gecko)
description:
Colony Defender is a Third Person Mech Shooter which was created during a university course about game mechanics.

KimCodeKill: My assignment in this project was to write code for bullet interaction, and make the weapons. I also acted as a Github coach as my fellow developers weren’t quite comfortable with the workflow. In general a project I’m quite happy with.
